text: neohuiga sangcheoleul ib-eossdamyeon geu baegseongdeuldo geumankeum sangcheoleul bad-ass nola igeos-eun hananim-i ingan-ege juneun heungmangseongsoe igeoneul hananim-eun midneun sin-ang-indeul-eul algo gyesieo neo hui gaundeseo sungyojadeul-eul taeghasido da icheoleom hananim-eun umaehan jadeul eul salanghaji anh-eusinila
